title: Sponsorship & Government Relations
titleLarge: Lawful residency and work authorization for personnel across the region
desc: Registration with ministries, renewals, transfers, status changes, attestation, and full GR management.
shortDesc: Complete sponsorship and government relations across Kuwait and the GCC.
desc1: UKL provides complete sponsorship and government relations services across Kuwait and the GCC. We handle registration and establishment of work files with relevant ministries and government agencies, ensuring lawful residency and work authorization for your personnel. Our experienced team manages renewals, transfers, status changes, and document attestation with efficiency and compliance.
desc2: We maintain strong relationships with government entities and understand the regulatory landscape across Kuwait, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Bahrain, Egypt, and Jordan. Our services include permit schedules, status reports, and comprehensive compliance documentation to keep your operations running smoothly.

process.title: Services Process
process.titleLarge: Complete government relations and sponsorship management
process.desc: We manage all GR tasks to ensure legal status is maintained without interruption.

title: Housing & Accommodation
titleLarge: Sourcing, leasing, and management of accommodation across prime locations
desc: Compounds and apartments with amenities, housekeeping, utilities, and preventive maintenance.
shortDesc: Flexible accommodation options with full facility management.
desc1: UKL provides comprehensive housing and accommodation services across Kuwait and the GCC. We source, lease, and manage compounds and apartments in prime and desirable locations, offering various sizes to meet specific requirements. Properties feature extensive amenities including swimming pools, 24/7 security, fitness facilities, and recreational areas.
desc2: All accommodations include housekeeping services, utilities management, preventive maintenance programs, and dedicated helpdesk support. We provide occupancy plans, HSE briefings, asset lists, and detailed maintenance logs to ensure transparency and quality across all properties.

process.title: Services Process
process.titleLarge: Complete accommodation management from sourcing to daily operations
process.desc: End-to-end accommodation setup and operations with quality controls.

title: Vehicles & Fleet Management
titleLarge: Latest vehicle models for short and long-term requirements
desc: Sedans, SUVs, pickups, vans, and buses with drivers, maintenance, replacements, and telematics.
shortDesc: Comprehensive fleet solutions with maintenance and tracking.
desc1: UKL offers comprehensive fleet management services featuring the latest vehicle models including sedans, crossovers, SUVs, pickup trucks, vans, and buses. We provide flexible short-term and long-term options with professional drivers on request.
desc2: Services include preventive maintenance programs, replacement units to ensure zero downtime, and telematics systems for real-time tracking and optimization. We maintain fleet registers, maintenance schedules, incident logs, and usage reports.

process.title: Services Process
process.titleLarge: Complete fleet management from procurement to daily operations
process.desc: Safe, reliable, and efficient fleet operations at scale.

title: Transportation Services
titleLarge: Movement of people and goods across the region
desc: Scheduled shuttles, on-call transport, regional transfers, and dispatch oversight with journey management.
shortDesc: Professional transport with planning and safety controls.
desc1: UKL provides comprehensive transportation services for the movement of people and goods across Kuwait and the GCC, including scheduled shuttle programs, on-call transport, regional transfers, and professional dispatch oversight.
desc2: We implement route planning, driver briefings, vehicle checks, and journey management to ensure punctual, safe, and efficient movement for operations.

process.title: Services Process
process.titleLarge: Complete transportation management from planning to execution
process.desc: Operational controls and visibility for every journey.

title: Emergency Support Services
titleLarge: Around-the-clock support for incidents and urgent needs
desc: Hospital assistance, legal coordination, emergency transport, and continuity activation.
shortDesc: Round-the-clock incident response with trained teams and clear escalation.
desc1: UKL maintains 24/7 emergency response capabilities to support clients around the clock. We provide hospital assistance, police coordination for legal matters, and immediate emergency transport services.
desc2: Clear escalation paths and continuity planning ensure rapid response and effective incident management, with incident logging and real-time updates.

process.title: Services Process
process.titleLarge: Complete emergency response and incident management
process.desc: Immediate response with trained personnel and procedures.

title: Catering Services
titleLarge: Professional catering for sites, events, and VIP functions
desc: Menu planning, hygiene controls, punctual delivery, and customized meal options.
shortDesc: Full-service catering with quality and safety controls.
desc1: UKL provides professional catering services for sites, corporate events, and VIP functions across Kuwait and the GCC, with menu planning, strict hygiene controls, and punctual delivery.
desc2: Customized meal options meet dietary and cultural requirements, with detailed menu cycles and service logs for quality assurance.

process.title: Services Process
process.titleLarge: Complete catering management from planning to delivery
process.desc: From menu design to quality assurance, we manage it all.

title: Event Planning & Protocol
titleLarge: Corporate events, protocol activities, and professional coordination
desc: Venue coordination, logistics, guest services, materials management, and full event delivery.
shortDesc: Professional event planning and protocol services.
desc1: UKL delivers comprehensive event planning and protocol services for corporate events, official functions, and high-profile activities, including venue coordination, logistics, guest services, and materials production.
desc2: We manage planning through post-event review, including run sheets, stakeholder coordination, and protocol for VIPs and delegations.

process.title: Services Process
process.titleLarge: Complete event management from concept to execution
process.desc: Every detail handled for professional, seamless events.

title: General Contracting & Fit-Out
titleLarge: Accommodation readiness, office setup, and comprehensive contracting services
desc: Civil and basic MEP works, professional fit-out, and make-good/hand-back services.
shortDesc: Complete contracting from design to handover.
desc1: UKL prepares accommodations, offices, and facilities for operational use, including civil works, basic MEP installations, professional fit-out, and make-good/hand-back services for lease returns.
desc2: We implement method statements, risk assessments, and quality controls with full handover documentation, as-built drawings, and compliance certification.

process.title: Services Process
process.titleLarge: Complete contracting from design to handover
process.desc: Disciplined execution with documentation and QA/QC.
